name: Adventures of Isabelle Fine: Murder on Rails
detailed_description:
Isabelle Fine; a space faring, time traveling, dimension jumping smart mouth is off on her first adventure. First, "documented," adventure at least, she's had a ton of adventures up until now. Just not like. You know. Any that you can see, or read about, or play.

Anyway.

You like story? She'll give it to you. You like dialogue? We've got reams of it. You want simulated 2d walking with other occasional virtual actions? We've got that too. As a bonus you'll get puzzles that nearly always resemble game-play, and humor that is sometimes amusing. You might as well try it since the sequel is already in the works, so you're going to be seeing the name more and more over the next 5.289 years or so.

Just accept it.

Unless you don't like story, and dialogue, and adventure, and good times, and emotions, and words, and reading... then try something else.

Jump on board, and enjoy the ride.
